title: Melinda French Gates Talks About Her Ex-Husband and Jeffrey Epstein
summary: Melinda French Gates, a famous philanthropist, recently spoke about her ex-husband Bill Gates, who started Microsoft. She said that new documents mentioning Bill Gates in connection with Jeffrey Epstein, a bad man who hurt people, brought back sad memories from her marriage. Melinda feels very sad about the Epstein situation and thinks Bill and others named should explain their actions. Bill Gates has denied any wrongdoing, saying the claims are false. The documents include emails from Epstein that make accusations, but it's unclear if they were sent. Melinda and Bill divorced in 2021 after 27 years together. This story is about family feelings and public questions.

background_read: This article is about Melinda French Gates, who was married to Bill Gates, the co-founder of Microsoft. They worked together to help people through their charity. Jeffrey Epstein was a wealthy man who was accused of hurting many people and died in jail. When new papers came out linking Bill Gates to Epstein, Melinda shared her feelings. It's important to understand that sometimes public figures face questions about their actions, and families can feel sad when old issues come up. This story shows how personal and public lives can mix.
